attributes.additional_details: We, the British people, ask for the school at Dunblane to be replaced with a new purpose built school in honour of Andy Murray's win, so that they can now build on a positive experience and that the British people can show their love and appreciation for a man who has demonstrated so much to us as a nation. this is NOT a political statement about independence or staying within the UK, it is a gift to a town that has suffered so much with the hope that it removes their pain and replaces it with inspiration and the love of the British people.
